column4:
Same as our regular skinsuit but with added pockets on the rear for storage. Perfect for criteriums or kermesse racing


Features:



  • unlimited number of colours

  • Rear pockets

  • Available with 4 way stretch specific chamios

  • 4-Way® stretch chamois 

  • no extra charge for colored shorts

  • no extra charge for back panel printing

  • Standard elastic leg grippers

  • lycra colours available in black, red, blue, navy, green and gray

Designed specifically for the cyclocross racer in mind. Take our regular skinsuit but fleece line it for the ultimate in warmth during the cold cyclocross season.


Features:



  • unlimited number of colours

  • entire suit is fleece-lined for warmth

  • available with either Veloce, Granfondo or Donna Forte Chamois 

  • 4-Way® stretch chamois 

  • no extra charge for colored shorts

  • no extra charge for back panel printing

  • no extra charge for full long-sleeve artwork

  • Note: The skinsuit picture on the left is the design we made for current World Junior Champion Tijmen Eising of Team Revor. We don't make a "pro" and "amateur" uniform - you will be racing in the same cyclocross skinsuit as a world champion!

Features:



  • unlimited number of colours

  • 4-Way® stretch chamois

  • no extra charge for coloured shorts

  • no extra charge for back panel printing

  • no extra charge for full long sleeve artwork

  • Standard elastic leg grippers
